title: Vego Salad Bar - St 51
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Fish is the only meat, otherwise food is veg. Salad bar, with wraps, sandwiches, bagels, and juices. Build-your-own salad with choice of greens plus other ingredients, condiment, and dressing. Has Wi-Fi. It's next door to Dosa Corner and round the corner from the BKK 'Golden Mile' of hotels with the word 'Golden' in their names, at front of Wat Lanka, corner of Sihanouk.
streetAddress: 3 Eo Street 51 (Pasteur Street), Boeng Keang Kong
